name: Tales of Mythica: Assertion (Canceled)
blurb: [RPG] Tales of Mythica: Assertion is a Large Scale Open World Role Playing Game. Using the Unreal Engine 4 with Innovative Technology.

rewards.reward:
Your name in the credits of the game.
"KickStarted" Forum Badge on GGN Forums.
A Big Thanks! From the GGN Dev Team.
KickStarter Item pack when the game comes out.

Your name in the credits of the game in Pink. Contributor Rank on the GGN Forums "KickStarted" Forum Badge on GGN Forums. A Big Thanks! From the GGN Dev Team. KickStarter Item pack when the game comes out. 1 Digital Download of the Finished Game.
